com.crickettechnology.audio

Class BitCrusherParam

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crickettechnology.audio.BitCrusherParam

  • public final class BitCrusherParam
extends java.lang.Object
    Parameters for the Bit Crusher effect

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BIT_RESOLUTION
      Number of bits of resolution to keep in the input samples, in [1..24].
      static int HOLD_MS
      Milliseconds to hold each sample value.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • BIT_RESOLUTION

        public static final int BIT_RESOLUTION
        Number of bits of resolution to keep in the input samples, in [1..24].
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HOLD_MS

        public static final int HOLD_MS
        Milliseconds to hold each sample value. Higher values result in more reduction in the effective sample rate. Values around 1 ms provide a reasonable effect.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
